issue.title: [C++/Flight] Compilation fails due to unreachable code
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4902](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4902). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
clang on OSX is quite picky, we can simply remove this code.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4902?focusedCommentId=16793807) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Clean build makes things okish again, closing as not so important.
